title: Case-Based Simulation Course to Facilitate Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational structure and business processes
context.additional_context: The VR simulation is provided in a mobile-optimized version, with learning activities designed based on three real-world case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three types of structural conflicts within organizations and classify them according to context
Learners can apply two or more learning-facilitation strategies in conflict situations through VR simulations
Learners can propose one organizational learning activation plan based on case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
